text:
North West is only four years old, but she's got some serious makeup skills. Remember when she did her aunt Khloe Kardashian's makeup?

It's no wonder: when your mom works with the best makeup artists in the world on the regular — and has her own sold-out product line — you're bound to be fascinated by beauty products even as a youngster. Not to mention the fact that North's aunt Kylie Jenner is a makeup mogul in her own right.

North wants to join the family beauty empire already, apparently. Mom Kim Kardashian West told Women's Wear Daily that North is obsessed with beauty unboxing YouTube channels and she wants one of her own.

"My daughter watches so many YouTube tutorials and videos and she was unboxing the My Little Pony Colourpop collection and I thought to myself, ‘I wish I was recording this’ because her reaction was so funny," Kim told WWD. "And then she did makeup on the My Little Pony that they gave and she said, ‘Mom, I want to do a YouTube video.’”

My cutie! A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Nov 3, 2017 at 7:04pm PDT

We can so picture North saying, "Subscribe to my YouTube channel for more haul videos." It's not going to happen, though. Kim said she won't let North wear makeup herself for some time, and her husband Kanye vetoed the whole beauty YouTube video idea — although they will let North film one just for fun to “test it out," not for posting. Maybe the next generation of Kar-Jenners will start up a YouTube channel together in the next decade or so.
title: North West Wants to Have Her Own Beauty Video YouTube Channel
